main event: A witness reported seeing a metal object with a bright glow, changing from green to white, moving slowly in the sky near New Winchester, Ohio on March 26, 1967.
interesting points: The object remained motionless for 15 to 20 seconds before disappearing,The object emitted no sound and was compared to the size of an oval platter,The sighting was corroborated by three other youths in a nearby car,The witness estimated the object's speed to be around 1000 mph,The witness reported no prior UFO sightings despite watching the object clearly.
sighted object: metal oval object glowing with green and white colors
witness description: A 39-year-old female who observed the object from a vehicle, along with three local young men.
